description.value: A set of codes that define the organisation roles that give added information for an organisation/site's function, for the Organisation Data Service (ODS). For more information and an up to date list see: [Organisation Data Service CodeSet](https://digital.nhs.uk/services/organisation-data-service/codesystems).
